title: 'Angels' Find Pre-Civil War Home In Idyllic Interracial Enclave
teaser: NPR's Tamara Keith talks to Breena Clark about her new novel, Angels Make Their Hope Here. It follows Dossie Bird, a girl who escapes slavery in 1849 and flees to a refuge in New Jersey.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
